column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2022
column14: Not a true 4k dash cam. The sensor it uses (Sony IMX323) only goes to 1080p.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
column14: The build quality is great as usual. The casing, buttons, screen, and accessories are all well made.

column6: Save your money! Do not buy this!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2021
column14: Our first set lasted 3 weeks with minimal use. I requested an exchange for the same set. That on last led one week. The mount that attaches to the headrest is flimsy and not well made. That’s what recently broke on ours, as well as the dvds not spinning or playing anymore. The first set also had a broken mount and one was stuck on a menu screen that we could not exit out of.

column6: Got a returned bad unit from AMAZON What, no qaulity control?
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2021
column14: Got a returned bad unit from AMAZON, What, no quality control? Box retaped, parts were removed and placed in a bag that were on a connected plastic part holder. One unit didn't recognize DVD, other unit would power up and 5 seconds died. Their website said to update the firmware, did that, did exactly the same things. Don't bother with this one.

column6: Worth the money kids love them ❤️.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
column14: I been using them for a month, no problems at all they are worth it. My two girls love them (4,1 ) year old. Easy to set up. Will buy again in the future.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2022
column14: Absolutely worth the money. I most definitely will be ordering more of these for both vehicles I absolutely love them even my husband wants a set in his truck. Thank you so much
